text:
Kelli Berglund (born February 9, 1996) is an American actress. She is known for playing Bree Davenport in the Disney XD series "Lab Rats" and its spin-off '. In 2014, she played Mae Hartley in the Disney Channel Original Movie "How to Build a Better Boy". She later played Carly Carson in the 2019 Starz television drama series "Now Apocalypse".
Berglund has been honored with many awards for her lyrical contemporary music and jazz.
Berglund was born in Moorpark, California.

annotations.surface_form: How to Build a Better Boy
